description.original: This is a simple plugin that converts the selected markdown to HTML and copies it to the clipboard.
description.translation: This is a simple plugin that converts the selected markdown to HTML and copies it to the clipboard.

dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, removes wikilink: .setDesc("If enabled, removes wikilink brackets from copied text.")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, removes text styl: .setDesc("If enabled, removes text styling such as bold, italics, and highlights.")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, removes text imme: .setDesc("If enabled, removes text immediately after a hashtag.")
